metadata.hypothesis_statement: International Canoe Federation is preparing procurement related to UI/UX Design Project
metadata.justification: The content contains an explicit, active RFP for an OTT platform development project issued by the International Canoe Federation with a current deadline (13th January 2026). This meets the HIGH CONFIDENCE criteria for active procurement with detailed requirements.

metadata.hypothesis_statement: International Canoe Federation is preparing procurement related to Python Data Processing Project
metadata.justification: The content shows an active procurement signal through an explicit RFP for OTT platform development issued by ICF with a current deadline (13th January 2026). While this RFP is for an OTT platform rather than directly for Python data processing, the stated objectives include 'give ICF full ownership of audience data, enabling deeper analysis and informed content creation strategies' which strongly suggests data processing capabilities will be required. This represents a procurement readiness signal for data-related technology.
